nodes.bodyText: So in order to delete and update, you need to run the script twice? you cannot have both d and u?

yes. thats the idea. I figured that if anything happens and there is a crash midway, then it will cause inconsistencies and delete unwanted data. e.g. if we delete iteration 3 and as we are updating the remaining ones i.e. 4 and 5 then something goes wrong, if we run the script again, we will then delete the updated ones from 4 and 5.
what happens is formId is null?

if we have only one question group matching then the data is deleted correctly but if for example we have two forms with the same question group, then we get an exception and cannot perform any updates.
